title: Systemic Risk in Interconnected Financial Markets
itunes:author: Professor Luitgard Veraart
description: Contributor(s): Professor Luitgard Veraart | This talk explains insights from mathematics to model loss cascades and apply them to recent financial stress events.
itunes:summary: Contributor(s): Professor Luitgard Veraart | This talk explains insights from mathematics to model loss cascades and apply them to recent financial stress events.
